languages.text: Does not have an {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}area attack{/g}. Increases {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} from all sources against any {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g} targets by +15% until the end of combat. Does not stack.
languages.original_text: Не может совершать {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}атаки по области{/g}. Цели, получившие {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}попадание{/g}, до конца боя получают на 15% больше {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}урона{/g} из любых источников. Эффект не суммируется.

traits.locale_text: Doesn't have an {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}area{/g} attack. Increases damage from all sources against any {g|Encyclopedia:Hit}hit{/g} targets by +15% until the end of combat. Doesn't stack.

Не может совершать {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}атаки по области{/g}. Цели, получившие {g|Encyclopedia:Hit}попадание{/g}, до конца боя получают на 15% больше урона из любых источников. Эффект не суммируется.

languages.text: 此武器无法进行{g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}范围攻击{/g}。{g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}命中{/g}目标时，该目标承受的所有{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}伤害{/g}都会提高15%，效果持续至战斗结束。此效果无法叠加。
languages.original_text: Does not have an {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}area attack{/g}. Increases {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} from all sources against any {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g} targets by +15% until the end of combat. Does not stack.

traits.locale_text: 此武器无法进行{g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}范围攻击{/g}。命中目标时，该目标承受的所有伤害都会提高15%，效果持续至战斗结束。{g|Encyclopedia:Hit}{/g}此效果无法叠加。

languages.text: {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}範囲攻撃{/g}は適用されない。戦闘終了まで{g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}命中{/g}したターゲットに対するすべてのソースからの{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}ダメージ{/g}を+15%増加させる。スタックされない。
languages.original_text: Does not have an {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}area attack{/g}. Increases {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} from all sources against any {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g} targets by +15% until the end of combat. Does not stack.

traits.locale_text: {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}範囲攻撃{/g}は適用されない。戦闘終了まで{g|Encyclopedia:Hit}命中{/g}したターゲットに対するすべてのソースからのダメージ+15%この効果は累積しない。

languages.text: Con esta arma no se pueden realizar {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}ataques de área{/g}. Al {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}impactar{/g} a objetivos, aumenta +15 % el {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}daño{/g} de todo tipo que reciban hasta el final del combate. Este efecto no es acumulativo.
languages.original_text: Does not have an {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}area attack{/g}. Increases {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} from all sources against any {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g} targets by +15% until the end of combat. Does not stack.

traits.locale_text: Con esta arma no se pueden realizar {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}ataques de área{/g}. Al {g|Encyclopedia:Hit}impactar{/g} a objetivos, aumenta +15 % el daño de todo tipo que reciban hasta el final del combate. Este efecto no es acumulativo.

languages.text: Hat keinen {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}Flächenangriff{/g}. Erhöht bis zum Ende des Kampfes den {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}Schaden{/g} von allen Quellen gegen sämtliche {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}getroffenen{/g} Ziele um +15 %. Nicht stapelbar.
languages.original_text: Does not have an {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}area attack{/g}. Increases {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} from all sources against any {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g} targets by +15% until the end of combat. Does not stack.

traits.locale_text: Hat keinen {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}Flächenangriff{/g}. Erhöht bis zum Ende des Kampfes den Schaden von allen Quellen gegen sämtliche {g|Encyclopedia:Hit}getroffenen{/g} Ziele um +15 %. Addiert sich nicht.

languages.text: Pas d'{g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}attaque de zone{/g}. Augmente de +15 % les {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}dégâts{/g} infligés aux cibles {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}touchées{/g}, toutes sources confondues, jusqu'à la fin du combat. Non cumulable.
languages.original_text: Does not have an {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}area attack{/g}. Increases {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} from all sources against any {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g} targets by +15% until the end of combat. Does not stack.

traits.locale_text: Pas d'{g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}attaque de zone{/g}. Augmente de +15 % les dégâts infligés aux cibles {g|Encyclopedia:Hit}touchées{/g}, toutes sources confondues, jusqu'à la fin du combat. Non cumulable.

languages.text: Bir {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}alan saldırısı{/g} bulunmamaktadır. {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}Vurulan{/g} hedeflere karşı her türlü kaynaktan gelen {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}hasarı{/g} +%15 artırır. Etkisi çatışma sonuna dek sürer. Etki üst üste birikmez.
languages.original_text: Does not have an {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}area attack{/g}. Increases {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} from all sources against any {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g} targets by +15% until the end of combat. Does not stack.
